remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `index` 指示超過位元組陣列末端的位置，則會引發例外狀況。If `index` indicates a position beyond the end of the byte array, an exception is raised. 若要避免引發例外狀況，請務必檢查屬性和`Length`屬性讀取之前，先`this`。To avoid raising an exception, always check the property and the `Length` property before reading `this`. 這個屬性是唯讀的。This property is read-only.
